name: Eden Eternal-聖境伝説
description:
The return of worldwide classic MMORPG ! Global Direct Operations!
Unite adventurous spirits, ride adorable alpaca, and join players all over the world to create your own journey memories. Sword and Magic will guide you as you explore the world of Eden. Create your own legend and become the Eternal One!

【Explore the Broad World of Eden】

Enter the fanstasitc world with vast and beautiful land. From volcano to glacier, plain to Dark Swamp, experience abandant and unique geography and climatic environments. Step over all mountains to move toward the distance.

【Switch Class Without Restriction】

Freely switch your class according to the environment and the team you stay. Experience the joy of each class and the meaning of adventure. With new class balance and huge optimization, players can find out their own orientations(?) and styles.

【Accompanied by Adorable Alpaca】

These cute and fluffy alpacas love to carry their owner around the Central Continent. Those fluffy partners are must-have mounts for each adventurer during the journey.

【New Continent with Various Races】

Eden is a vast world with various races. it is composed of 5 different continents, nurturing many unique creatures: Anura from southeast forest, Zumi from desert realm, Ursun from mountains. There are also Torturra, Drakin, Ogres, Tuskar, etc. Are you ready to explore the fascinating culture of each race?

【Customize Dyeing】

Flexible dyeing system allows you to become the unique one in the world of Eden. We provide renewed hairstyle and facial expression for character creation, and also add more than double hair, skin, and pupil colors! Enjoy the classic charm of MMORPG with multiple combinations!
